message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product.  Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $17,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective. How about we meet in the middle at $18,500? This price reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $18,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $16,500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, I appreciate your persistence.  I can tell you're serious.  To show some flexibility, I'm willing to come down to $17,500. I think this is a very fair offer considering the product's quality.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $17,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $16,000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
